About Us

Details about the company

Emphasizing following points.

  • Point no 1 Why go Solar
  • Point no 2 Benefits of Solar Energy
  • Point no 3 An environment friendly solution

Solar technology is gradually maturing and becoming more promising each day. Everyone wants to get a piece of the pie as the RE sector is set to grow by almost 5-6x over the next 10 years making India the largest RE market in the world after China. India currently has around 16 GW of annual solar module manufacturing capacity. Indiaâ€™s ambitious target of reaching 100GW of solar generation capacity by 2022 has been attracting a lot of foreign investors who are pouring money into the sector.
